name: Email Marketing Fundamentals Using Mailchimp
seo_title: Email Marketing Beginner Course: Mailchimps | Fiverr
seo_description: Learn about email marketing & how to use Mailchimp. Join Fiverr's email marketing course & training and boost your email marketing & Mailchimp skills
description: If email is a core part of your marketing strategy, you need to know your way around Mailchimp like an expert. Packed with useful downloads to help you, this course covers all the essentials needed to create an email marketing campaign from scratch.
